data.name: Real VR Fishing
data.description:
ü§† "RVRF is probably keeping me alive and giving me something to look forward to the next day like a Christmas gift.‚Äù  ‚Äî squir****

üòé "I'm just amazed by the immersive and realistic experiences that I‚Äôve had with the places and fishes in the game.‚Äù‚Äî Shroo*****

Have A Fish-tastic Day With Us At Real VR Fishing!
Real VR Fishing is a highly realistic fishing simulator with stunning graphics that you can enjoy with others.

üèûÔ∏è TRAVELING THE WORLD!
Immerse yourself and fish in several breathtaking locations from around the world. From Hawaii in the U.S. to the Han River in Korea, there is a fishing spot that is waiting just for you. 

üë• CONNECTING WITH FAMILY, FRIENDS, & NEW PEOPLE
Get inside a multiplayer room and interact with your family and friends virtually from afar. Or, better yet, join in any random room to meet new, friendly strangers!

üêü CUSTOMIZING YOUR AVATAR AND AQUARIUM
Express yourself in what you wear and how you decorate your aquarium. With several options to choose from, create a unique YOU that sets you apart from the rest. 

üé£ DISCOVERING DIFFERENT FISH SPECIES WITH YOUR FISHING TACKLES
Take on the challenge of fishing over 140 unique fish species! As you advance through the game, become an expert on knowing when to switch your rods, baits, bobbers, and reels to catch several unique fishes. 

üéß YOUTUBE & WEB-BROWSING
Elevate your fishing experience by using YouTube. Stay updated with the news or listen to your favorite tunes while reeling in your catch!
